item.description:
Bayside Lounge in Fairhaven hosts a Trivia Buff night every Thursday starting at 7. Meet in the table area at 6:45.
Trivia Buff includes 4 "semesters," each with 4 questions that you allocate a number of points to. There is also a 'name-that-tune' portion as well as additional bonus questions. Categories range from movies to sports to science.
There can be up to 6 people on a team. Depending on how many people show up we will make multiple teams.
Bayside Lounge has a full bar and reasonable drink prices. They now have food available, also at reasonable prices.

We are on a roll and have won the last 3 times we've played; join our winning team! Hope to see you there!!
item.how_to_find_us: look for me in the table area

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Trivia at the Bayside Lounge in Fairhaven
